title: Emerald Radiance Jhumkas - Pachi Jhumkaalu
materials: Base metal with 22K Gold Hyderabadi Polish. Featuring a Emerald gemstone (Pachi) with high clarity and brilliant cut
and carefully hand-placed cubic zirconia stones. Simulated pearl drop.
features: Classic bell-shaped jhumka design, showcasing intricate filigree work with detailed cubic zirconia accents. The vibrant Emerald stone adds a touch of regal charm. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the brilliance of the stones. Bottom pearl drop is designed to move gracefully.
colors: complemented by the deep Green of the Emerald and the soft luster of the Pearl.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings (vivaham)
and other special occasions. Its versatility also makes it suitable for modern parties and celebrations.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The high-quality Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and durable finish. The Emerald gemstone signifies prosperity and good fortune, making this a meaningful and stylish addition to any jewelry collection. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
